﻿Take your Westerosi adventure to new heights, with better, faster gameplay from Game of Thrones Slots!
-Continue to explore the beauty and wonder of Westeros with each new machine!
-Work together with other players to win big in our new group social machine, "Journey on the Kingsroad!"
-Play on your own to conquer the Dragon Jackpot before it flies away! 
-Soon you will Collect cards of your favorite Stark characters to upgrade your collection and win fantastic prizes!
